news.title: Senate passes stablecoin bill, a major victory for the crypto world
news.summary: The Senate on Tuesday passed a bill that would establish the first federal framework for dollar-backed cryptocurrencies known as stablecoins, a major victory for an industry that has pushed for more favorable oversight in Washington, D.C.

news.title: All new Facebook videos to be classified as Reels soon, Meta says
news.summary: The Instagram parent said Reels on Facebook will no longer have length or format restrictions, and include all types of video content — short, long and live.  Previously uploaded video content will remain as such on the platform while videos posted after the change will be classified as Reels.  The company will also rename the Video tab as Reels tab.

news.title: Exploring 3 High Growth Tech Stocks in the US Market
news.summary: Amidst the recent fluctuations in U.S. stock indices, driven by geopolitical tensions and economic data, investors are closely monitoring sectors that could offer resilient growth opportunities. In this context, high-growth tech stocks in the United States market can present compelling prospects for those seeking innovation-driven returns despite broader market volatility.
